channel.title: Docs on Gir.Core
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Gir.Core

item.description: API-Documentation # Note: The current API documentation is based on the development branch as there is no release available. The API is not stable or in a final state. Basic APIs # GObject GLib Gio GdkPixbuf Multimedia APIs # Gst Gst.PButils Gst.Audio Gst.Base Gst.Video UI APIs # Gtk3

Libraries # Currently there are multiple libraries planned to be integrated deeply into linux: Gtk , WebkitGTK , Libchamplain libhandy , GIO , gstreamer . Note: As the project is still in early development not all features mentioned below must be available: Refactorings can remove previous available features. GTK # Gtk is the toolkit which is used to display windows and widgets on the screen. The widgets can be added directly in code or described through an xml file.
